Agent¶

Overview¶

class Agent(environment, agent_id, position, communication_range=1)¶

Bases: ABC

Base Agent Class¶

Abstract class for agents - all agents should inherit from this class

param environment:

Environment in which the agent is operating - the pipe network

param agent_id:

ID of the agent

param position:

Position of the agent in the environment (starting position)

param communication_range:

Communication range of the agent

abstract action()¶

Method to get the action of the agent - update the action space :return: Action of the agent

property agent_id¶

Method to get the ID of the agent :return: ID of the agent

property belief: Belief¶

Method to get the belief of the agent :return: Belief of the agent

abstract comms_part1(overwatch)¶

Method to send a communication to other agents in the environment :param overwatch: overwatcher facilitating communication :return: None

abstract comms_part2(overwatch)¶

Method to recieve communication from other agents in the environment :param overwatch: overwatcher facilitating communication :return: None

abstract communicate(overwatch)¶

Method to communicate with other agents in the environment - send and receive transmissions :param environment: Environment in which the agent is communicating - the pipe network :return: None

property communication_range: int¶

Method to get the communication range of the agent :return: Communication range of the agent

abstract move() → None¶

Method to move the agent to the new position in the environment :return: None

abstract observe(environment) → Observation¶

Method to get the observation of the agent - update the observation space :param environment: Environment in which the agent is observing - the pipe network :update: Update the visited nodes :return: Observation of the agent

property position¶

Method to get the position of the agent :return: Position of the agent

property previous_position¶

Method to get the previous position of the agent :return: Previous position of the agent

abstract step() → None¶

This is a turn :return: None

property visited_nodes: list¶

Method to get the visited nodes of the agent :return: Visited nodes of the agent
